configmenusforge.gui.select.title: Select %s Config
configmenusforge.gui.select.world.title: Select %s Server Config World
configmenusforge.gui.select.select_world: Server configs are applied per world and therefore need a world file to be selected. You'll be able to do so on the next screen.
configmenusforge.gui.select.create_confi: This world seems to have never been loaded with %s. Before editing, a new config file will be created.
configmenusforge.gui.select.no_data: Data for this config hasn't been loaded yet.
configmenusforge.gui.select.no_permissio: The server doesn't support editing configs or you don't have the necessary permissions to do so.
configmenusforge.gui.select.multiplayer_: Editing this config will change it for everyone else playing on the server as well.
configmenusforge.gui.info.1: Hey there! You like what you see?
configmenusforge.gui.info.2: This menu was dynamically generated by the %s mod.
configmenusforge.gui.info.3: Click me to open its homepage and find out about all it has to offer!
configmenusforge.gui.message.discard: Are you sure you want to discard all changes?
configmenusforge.gui.message.dangerous.t: WARNING! Unable to determine internal type of this list.
If you proceed to edit the list will be treated as a list of strings which is not guaranteed to work. Entering incompatible values is likely to lead to a game crash.
configmenusforge.gui.message.restore.tit: Are you sure you want to restore all default values?
configmenusforge.gui.message.restore.war: WARNING! This config will be completely reset, a change which cannot be undone.
configmenusforge.gui.message.copy.title: Are you sure you want to set this config as a default?
configmenusforge.gui.message.copy.descri: A default config will be used whenever the config is re-created. This is mainly useful for setting default server configs which will be applied for newly created worlds.
configmenusforge.gui.message.copy.warnin: WARNING! Another config already exists in this location and will be overwritten upon copying.
configmenusforge.gui.type.title: %s Configuration
configmenusforge.gui.type.client: Client config is for configuration affecting the ONLY client state such as graphical options. Only loaded on the client side. Stored in the global config directory. Not synced.
configmenusforge.gui.type.common: Common mod config for configuration that needs to be loaded on both environments. Loaded on both servers and clients. Stored in the global config directory. Not synced.
configmenusforge.gui.type.server: Server type config is configuration that is associated with a server instance. Only loaded during server startup. Stored in a server/save specific "serverconfig" directory. Synced to clients during connection.
